alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 11:00PM CST until December 09 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1100 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Causeyville to near Middleton to near Barnett, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Quitman, Causeyville, Middleton, Sykes, and Snell around 1105 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
